```{r r-squared, echo = FALSE}
display_r_squared <- function(fit) {
  paste0(
    "$$R^2=",
    round(glance(fit)$r.squared[1], 3),
    ",R_{adj}^2=",
    round(glance(fit)$adj.r.squared[1], 3),
    ".$$"
  )
}
```
